title: Panasoinc Toughbook CF-30 Model C D Win XP SP2 clean install dri
description:
This is the driver software from Panasonic's website for a clean install of a Panasonic Toughbook CF-30 model c or model d - english with Microsoft Windows XP - service pack 2 

I don't know if these drivers will work with SP3. This file does NOT contain MS XP update files. 

Be aware that for a clean install, the Harddisk driver should be installed first. 

Also included are the HTML from Panasonic's website of the instructions associated with some of the more complicated installs. 

These files were compiled because Panasonic's site sucks. You probably don't need all of these drivers installed. Many of thier sites links are dead, and their java based site is slow and painful. So, here is the fast way to get all the files.

Good luck!
-H

If you are having GPS - Mouse issues panasoinc says:

"My touchpad/touchscreen is erratic. What do I do?
If your Toughbook has an integrated GPS, this may be conflicting with the touchpad or touchscreen driver. You can fix this by running the GPS Registry Patch - SKIPENUM.REG, which is found in the C:UTILGPS folder. This file can also be found by following the link below.

If you are using a GPS module that is not integrated, you should contact the manufacturer of the GPS module for a similar patch.

If you are not using a GPS module, or if the above steps do not fix your problem, re-install the touchpad and/or touchscreen drivers. "
